arts.ttl: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca aims dig at Man Utd that Sir Jim Ratcliffe is in agreement with
arts.sum: Ruben Amorim has had a full week to prepare his Manchester United side for their Premier League clash with Chelsea at Old Trafford on Saturday, and Enzo Maresca has spoken out ahead of the game

arts.ttl: Fitness boosts, Garnacho return: Four talking points ahead of Man United vs. Chelsea
arts.sum: Sports Mole picks out four talking points ahead of Manchester United's home Premier League fixture with Chelsea on Saturday evening.

arts.ttl: Manchester United vs Chelsea - Premier League Pre-Match Analysis - VAVEL International
arts.sum: • Chelsea also have positive news: Cole Palmer are back in to start a Premier game Since before the International break, adding depth and versatility in midfield and attack. Old Trafford will host one of English football’s great rivalries this weekend as Manchester United face Chelsea in a crucial Premier League clash.

arts.ttl: 11 players could miss Man United vs Chelsea amid triple injury boost
arts.sum: Chelsea will be without a plethora of players as they travel to Old Trafford this weekend to take on Manchester United in a huge Premier League clash

arts.ttl: November Premier League fixtures shift for TV coverage, UEFA duties, and midweek drama
arts.sum: Key kick-offs move for Sky and TNT Sports broadcasts, with clubs like Villa, Palace, and Forest rescheduled due to Europa ties. Updated match times keep fans tuned in all month.

arts.ttl: Chelsea team news vs Man Utd as Cole Palmer plan clear after Enzo Maresca update
arts.sum: Chelsea head coach Enzo Maresca has provided an update on the fitness of Cole Palmer ahead of the club's Premier League match against Manchester United on Saturday

arts.ttl: Chelsea boss Enzo Maresca reveals Alejandro Garnacho plan ahead of Man Utd clash
arts.sum: Alejandro Garnacho left Manchester United for Chelsea in a £40million deal in the summer transfer window and is now set to return to Old Trafford for the first time

arts.ttl: Transcript Ruben Amorim pre Chelsea press conference part one 19 September 2025
arts.sum: I understand you will appreciate the support, but you also know you do have to win matches, don't you? No, it is normal things, just to show the support and explaining that it is a long project, he said many times that this is my first season.

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim Reveals Man Utd Double Injury Boost for Chelsea Clash
arts.sum: Man Utd’s under pressure boss is still without a key player he says the team desperately “need.”

arts.ttl: Ruben Amorim gets DOUBLE Man United injury boost before Chelsea visit - and issues blunt 10-word reply to Alejandro Garnacho questions
arts.sum: CHRIS WHEELER: Both players were hurt in the 3-2 win over Burnley before the international break and missed last weekend's defeat by Manchester City in the Etihad derby.
